# Subscript


```````````````````````````````` example
CH~3~CH~2~OH
.
<p>CH<sub>3</sub>CH<sub>2</sub>OH</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
text~a\ subscript~
.
<p>text<sub>a subscript</sub></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
text~a subscript~
.
<p>text~a subscript~</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
text~a\~subscript~
.
<p>text<sub>a~subscript</sub></p>
````````````````````````````````
